Plot: In the tradition of "Creepshow", "Tales From the Crypt", "Tales From the Darkside", and "Trilogy of Terror" comes 5 horrific stories in the ultimate horror anthology.
Title: The Horror Network Vol. 1
Writer: Douglas Conner (created by), Brian Dorton (created by), Brian Dorton, Joseph Graham, Manuel Marín
Director: Brian Dorton, Joseph Graham, Manuel Marín, Lee Matthews, Douglas Conner, Ignacio Martín Lerma
Actors: Nick Frangione, Artem Mishin, Jan Cornet, Brian Dorton
